chapter.title: Upgrading Jersey in GlassFish
chapter.para: This chapter will present instructions to manually upgrade the Jersey version bundled with GlassFish installation.

section.title: GlassFish v3.0
section.para: GlassFish v3.0 comes up with Jersey version 1.1.4.1. To upgrade this version to &version; you will need to replace certain files manually.

GlassFish uses Jersey internally in it's REST administration API, and the Update Center client would not allow you to upgrade in order to prevent this functionality. The workaround described in this section is known to work, but it is not currently a tested and supported scenario. Please keep in mind things could break. It is recommended to back up all all impacted files. The actual replace steps follow.

Remove the existing Jersey files. Stop all running server instances. Then remove the following files from the GlassFish installation directory:
glassfish/modules/jsr311-api.jar glassfish/modules/jersey-gf-bundle.jar glassfish/modules/jersey-gf-statsproviders.jar glassfish/modules/jersey-multipart.jar glassfish/modules/jackson-core-asl.jar glassfish/modules/jackson-mapper-asl.jar glassfish/modules/jackson-jaxrs.jar glassfish/modules/jettison.jar glassfish/modules/mimepull.jar
Download the new Jersey version archive from
http://download.java.net/maven/2/com/sun/jersey/glassfish/v3/jersey-gfv3-core/&version;/jersey-gfv3-core-&version;-project.zip
and unzip it's glassfish/modules content into the GlassFish installation directory (to the glassfish/modules subdirectory there).

To install also Jersey examples in addition, download
http://download.java.net/maven/2/com/sun/jersey/glassfish/v3/jersey-gfv3-docs-and-samples/&version;/jersey-gfv3-docs-and-samples-&version;-project.zip
and unzip it's content into the GlassFish installation directory.
